trans-unit.source: Establishes a design-time service that manages the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"></xref> objects for components.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en utformingen-tjeneste som administrerer samlingen av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"> </xref> objekter for komponenter.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionService class is responsible for managing the collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects for each instance of a component that exists on a form at design time.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignerActionService er ansvarlig for å administrere samlingen av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>objekter for hver forekomst av en komponent som finnes i et skjema under utformingen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>

trans-unit.source: This class enables a direct push model of item creation, and is primarily intended for use by design-time tool developers, although it can also be used by component and custom control developers.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan en direkte push-modell for opprettelse av element, og er primært ment for bruk av utformingen Verktøyutviklere, selv om det kan også brukes av komponenten og tilpasset kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: Design-time tool developers will need to determine the list of items to display for a component and determine when this list changes.
trans-unit.target: Utformingen Verktøyutviklere må du finne listen over elementer å vise for en komponent og bestemmer når denne listen endres.

trans-unit.source: They may also create add-ins that operate in conjunction with smart tag panel objects.
trans-unit.target: De kan også opprette tillegg som fungerer sammen med smart koden panelet objekter.

trans-unit.source: Advanced component developers may need to dynamically control the items associated with a component, thus replacing or supplementing the standard pull model.
trans-unit.target: Avanserte komponent utviklere må kanskje dynamisk kontrollerer elementer som er knyttet til en komponent dermed erstatter eller utfylle standard pull-modellen.

trans-unit.source: For example, panel commands can be altered depending on the context of their use and the design-time state of the component.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoer kan for eksempel endres avhengig av konteksten for bruk og tilstanden utformingen av komponenten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DesignerActionService is actually the driving service behind both the push and pull models; however, in the latter case it operates implicitly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For DesignerActionService er faktisk motiverende tjenesten bak både push og pull modeller; imidlertid i det siste tilfellet den fungerer implisitt.

trans-unit.source: DesignerActionService provides a straightforward interface for accessing and manipulating the items for each component, including the following methods and events: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A> method determines whether the DesignerActionService is currently managing a particular component.
trans-unit.target: DesignerActionService har et enkelt grensesnitt for tilgang til og redigere elementer for hver komponent, inkludert følgende metoder og hendelser: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>metoden fastslår om DesignerActionService for øyeblikket administrerer en bestemt komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> method supports the enumeration of the lists of items.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>Metoden støtter opplisting av listen over elementer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method allows adding a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> to the set of existing items for a component instance.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>Metoden kan legge til en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>settet med eksisterende elementer for en Komponentforekomst.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> method removes one or all of the item lists associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>metoden fjerner ett av eller alle listene over elementer som er tilknyttet en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method represents the direct push model of associating panel items with a component.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>metoden representerer direkte push-modellen for å knytte elementer til en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property of the designer class for that component.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning pull-modellen avhengig overstyrer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>for klassen Spørringsutformer for denne komponenten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The design environment is responsible for adding these items into the current DesignerActionService when a component is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Utformingsmiljøet i er ansvarlig for å legge til disse elementene i den gjeldende DesignerActionService når en komponent er opprettet på utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods only consider or affect push-model items.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > I <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>, og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A>metoder Vurder å bare eller påvirke push-modellelementer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event indicates when the collection of items changes for a component.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>Hendelse angir når samlingen av elementer endres for en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: Because it is often desirable to use some of the same panel items in both the component's design-time shortcut menu and its panel, a large degree of interoperability exists between <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects and designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Fordi det er ofte ønskelig å bruke noen av de samme panel elementene i både komponentens utformingen hurtigmenyen og tilhørende panelet, stor grad av interoperabilitet finnes mellom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>objekter og designer verb.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>

trans-unit.source: If a component designer does not explicitly specify a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> (that is, it does not contain an overridden <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property), then a list will be created from existing designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Når en komponent utformer ikke eksplisitt er angitt en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>(det vil si den ikke inneholder en overstyrte <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskapen), og deretter opprettes en liste fra eksisterende designer verb.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: These verbs are specified by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Disse verb som er angitt av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, an internal verb list class is used to contain the collection of verb item panel entries.
trans-unit.target: En intern verbet listen klassen brukes i dette tilfellet inneholder samlingen av verbet elementet panelet oppføringer.

trans-unit.source: If you want a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> to be used both as a panel entry and a design-time shortcut menu entry, then you can set the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter in the item's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>brukes både som en panelet-post og en oppføring for utforming snarveien-menyen, kan du angi den `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter i konstruktøren for elementet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> to control the display of your designer's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>å kontrollere visningen av din designer's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A service provider is necessary for monitoring selection and component changes.
trans-unit.target: En leverandør er nødvendig for å overvåke utvalget og komponentendringer.

trans-unit.source: It is expected to support the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> types.
trans-unit.target: Det er forventet å støtte av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>typer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class uses an internal table to manage components and their associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>klassen bruker en intern tabell til å behandle komponenter og tilknyttede <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>smart koder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Typically, component developers will not need to create an instance of this class; instead, they can acquire an existing instance through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis trenger komponentutviklere ikke å opprette en forekomst av denne klassen. i stedet de kan skaffe en eksisterende forekomst via et kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The service provider for the current design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: -Leverandør for gjeldende utformingen-miljøet.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to the current collection of managed smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> gjeldende-samlingen for forvaltet smart koder.

trans-unit.source: The Add method represents the push model of adding smart tag items.
trans-unit.target: Add-metode representerer push-modellen for å legge til elementer for smart koden.

trans-unit.source: The alternate pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property in the designer for the corresponding component.
trans-unit.target: Alternativ pull-modell, avhengig av overstyrer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskapen i designer for den tilsvarende komponenten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden kalles, lister som skal legges til skannes for noen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A>-egenskapen satt til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Disse elementene er lagt til i listen over verb som Spørringsutformer for denne komponenten via et kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis.
trans-unit.target: Smartkortet koder administreres på forekomsten basis komponent.

trans-unit.source: The managed collection may contain duplicate entries.
trans-unit.target: Den forvaltede samlingen kan inneholde duplikatoppføringer.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to associate the smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> å knytte smart koder med.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> that contains the new smart tag items to be added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> som inneholder de nye smart kode elementene som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En eller begge parameterne er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> to the current collection of managed smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> gjeldende-samlingen for forvaltet smart koder.

trans-unit.source: The Add method represents the push model of adding smart tag items.
trans-unit.target: Add-metode representerer push-modellen for å legge til elementer for smart koden.

trans-unit.source: The alternate pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property in the designer for the corresponding component.
trans-unit.target: Alternativ pull-modell, avhengig av overstyrer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskapen i designer for den tilsvarende komponenten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden kalles, lister som skal legges til skannes for noen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A>-egenskapen satt til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Disse elementene er lagt til i listen over verb som Spørringsutformer for denne komponenten via et kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis.
trans-unit.target: Smartkortet koder administreres på forekomsten basis komponent.

trans-unit.source: The managed collection may contain duplicate entries.
trans-unit.target: Den forvaltede samlingen kan inneholde duplikatoppføringer.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to associate the smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> å knytte smart koder med.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> that contains the new smart tag items to be added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> som inneholder de nye smart kode elementene som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En eller begge parameterne er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all components from management and clears all push-model smart tag lists.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle komponentene fra administrasjon og tømmer alle push-modellen smartkodelister.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method empties the internal table used to store information about components and their push-model smart tag lists.
trans-unit.target: Fjern for tømmer den interne tabellen som brukes til å lagre informasjon om komponenter og deres push-modellen smartkodelister.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Because this method affects all components managed by the current service, and not just the current component, this method should be used judiciously.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Fordi denne metoden påvirker alle komponentene som administreres av gjeldende tjenesten og ikke bare den gjeldende komponenten, denne metoden skal brukes med varsomhet.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the design-time tool developer uses it when resetting a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis bruker utvikleren utformingen verktøyet den under tilbakestilling av en utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Component developers should use one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> methods instead to remove individual smart tag items or lists.
trans-unit.target: Komponentutviklere bør bruke en av de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>metoder i stedet å fjerne individuelle smart koden som eller viser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is raised for each component that was previously managed by the current service.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>hendelsen starter for hver komponent ble tidligere administreres av gjeldende service.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current smart tag service manages the action lists for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om tjenesten gjeldende smart koden administrerer listene handlingen for den angitte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method only recognizes push-model smart tags, which are associated to a component with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden inneholder bare gjenkjenner smart koder for push-modell, som er knyttet til en komponent med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although there is no structural limitation on the number of concurrent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> instances created by a design-time tool, typically only a single instance of the service is created per design surface.
trans-unit.target: Selv om det finnes ingen strukturell begrensning på antall samtidige <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>forekomster opprettet i en utformingen-verktøyet, vanligvis bare én forekomst av tjenesten opprettes per utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component is managed by the current service; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis komponenten administreres av gjeldende tjenesten. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> is removed or added for any component.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> fjernes eller legges til for alle komponenter.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the set of specialized classes associated with the DesignerActionListsChanged event.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser settet med spesialiserte klasser som er knyttet til DesignerActionListsChanged-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: |Specialized type|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>|Adds information specific to smart tag list management.
trans-unit.target: | Spesialiserte typen | Beskrivelse | |----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>| Legger til vil ha informasjon om smart koden listen management.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This class is specialized from <xref:System.EventArgs>.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler>|Connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> with its handler.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType>|Denotes whether a list has been added or removed.| For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er spesialiserte fra <xref:System.EventArgs>. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler>| Kobler <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>behandlingsprogrammet. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType>| Angir om en liste er lagt til eller fjernet. | Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> </xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden er implementering av metoden bare obligatoriske den <xref:System.IDisposable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden når du er ferdig med <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: It performs two main actions: - Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Utfører den to primære handlinger:-fjerner gjeldende tjenesten fra listen over tilgjengelige tjenester i utformingsmiljøet via et kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface.
trans-unit.target: -Avsluttede abonnementer på komponent endre hendelser fra den tilknyttede <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>ble bruker.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A>metoden er implementering av metoden bare obligatoriske den <xref:System.IDisposable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden når du er ferdig med <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: It performs two main actions: - Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Utfører den to primære handlinger:-fjerner gjeldende tjenesten fra listen over tilgjengelige tjenester i utformingsmiljøet via et kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface.
trans-unit.target: -Avsluttede abonnementer på komponent endre hendelser fra den tilknyttede <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>referanser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer samling av elementet smartkodelister knyttet til en komponent.

trans-unit.source: The GetComponentActions method is equivalent to a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29> method using a `type` parameter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetComponentActions tilsvarer et kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29>metoden bruker en `type` -parameteren for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the collection returned will contain both the push and pull lists of smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen returnerte vil derfor inneholde både push pull listene og smart koder.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is the union of item lists added through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> methods and also the lists obtained from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> instance obtained from the component’s site.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>er Unionen elementlister lagt til med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>metoder og listene hentet fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet>forekomsten hentes fra komponentens webområdet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som smart koder er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: The collection of smart tags for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Samling av smart koder for den angitte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists of the specified type associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer samling av smart koden elementlister med den angitte typen som er knyttet til en komponent.

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> method filters on the `type` parameter, which can have one of the following values.
trans-unit.target: Denne versjonen av den overbelastet <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>metoden filtrerer på den `type` parameteren som kan ha én av følgende verdier.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>|All associated smart tags.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>|Pull-model smart tags only.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>|Push-model smart tags only.| If the associated designer for a component does not supply a pull-model smart tag list, then the GetComponentActions method will instead use the designer's design-time shortcut menu items from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>| Alle tilknyttede smart koder. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>| Pull-modellen smartkortet merker bare. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>| Push-modellen smartkortet merker bare. | Hvis den tilknyttede utformeren for en komponent ikke angir en pull-modellen smart koden liste, og deretter metoden GetComponentActions bruker i stedet den utformeren utformingen hurtigmenyelementer fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som smart koder er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType"></xref> to filter the associated smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType"> </xref> til å filtrere tilknyttede smart koder med.

trans-unit.source: The collection of smart tags of the specified type for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Samling av smart koder for den angitte typen for den angitte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the pull-model smart tags associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Henter pull-modellen smart kodene knyttet til en komponent.

trans-unit.source: The GetComponentDesignerActions method is a helper method for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetComponentDesignerActions er en helper for den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>metoder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: GetComponentDesignerActions searches for pull-model smart tags of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>, and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection.
trans-unit.target: GetComponentDesignerActions søker etter pull-modellen smart koder av typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>, og legger dem til den angitte `actionLists` samlingen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>

trans-unit.source: If the component's developer does not explicitly supply a collection of smart tags through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property of its designer, this method will reuse the design-time shortcut menu entries, which are obtained through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis komponentens utvikleren ikke leverer eksplisitt en samling av smart koder via den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskapen for designer, denne metoden vil bruke utformingen snarvei menyen poster som er anskaffet via den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>for utformeren.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som smart koder er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: The collection to add the associated smart tags to.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen å legge til de tilknyttede smart kodene til.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En eller begge parameterne er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the push-model smart tags associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Henter push-modellen smart kodene knyttet til en komponent.

trans-unit.source: The GetComponentServiceActions method is a helper method for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetComponentServiceActions er en helper for den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>metoder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: It searches for push-model smart tags of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>, and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter push-modellen smart koder av typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>, og legger dem til den angitte `actionLists` samlingen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som smart koder er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: The collection to add the associated smart tags to.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen å legge til de tilknyttede smart kodene til.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En eller begge parameterne er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified smart tag list from all components managed by the current service.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner listen angitte smart koden fra alle komponentene som administreres av gjeldende service.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> method is typically used by design tool developers, because component developers typically do not know what other components exist in the current design space.
trans-unit.target: Denne versjonen av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>metoden brukes av utformingen Verktøyutviklere, fordi komponentutviklere vanligvis ikke vet hvilken andre komponenter finnes i gjeldende område for utforming.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: If successful, this method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis fullført, denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The list of smart tags to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Listen over smart koder som skal fjernes.

trans-unit.source: actionList is .
trans-unit.target: actionListis .

trans-unit.source: Removes all the smart tag lists associated with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle de smartkodelister knyttet til den angitte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: If successful, the Remove method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis fullført, Remove-metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The component to disassociate the smart tags from.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten å fjerne tilkoblingen smart koder fra.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified smart tag list from the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner listen angitte smart koden fra den angitte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: If successful, the Remove method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis fullført, Remove-metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The component to disassociate the smart tags from.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten å fjerne tilkoblingen smart koder fra.

trans-unit.source: The smart tag list to remove.
trans-unit.target: Smartkortet koden listen som skal fjernes.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En eller begge parameterne er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
